modName: Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music - Sound
summary:
Dark Mode brings skyrim into a dark combat music and sound effects from the awesome Two Step's from hell a very Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul that makes you beg for enemies so you just fight with darkness!
Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=4]Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][/center][right][img]https://fsmedia.imgix.net/91/71/9c/a5/f780/48f8/ac95/6fe838e5498c/darkknightsample.jpeg[/img]﻿
                                           By wallscover.com                  [/right]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][center]Dark Mode brings skyrim into a dark combat music and sound effects from the awesome Two Step's from hell a very Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul that makes you beg for enemies so you just fight with darkness![/center][/size][/font][color=#00ff00][center]Music copyright goes to Two Step's From hell especialy thanks to marcus Vandiloft for granting me the support and ability to use their track's!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/HMkEIAL.png[/img]﻿
[img]http://blackwhitedesign.de/00LEThalmorcrusher/forever-free-by-aluckymuse-and-the-creation-kids_40628612401_o.png[/img]﻿[/center][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=3]Includes:

[/size][/color][/font]I did not just take the tracks and converted them into skyrim, i modified quite alot so that sounds a bit dark and gothic just as my other mods

[b][color=#00ff00][size=3]Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul - Dark Angel's Edition- v1.0.0.1 Is out though there is still much to be done & new music to work on![/size]
[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]CHANGELOG[/color]: 

v1.0.0.1 Dark Angel's Edition -BETA-

[list]
[*]New Death Music which fit's suprisingly with Skyrim ( First thing to do after installing this update is die a few times xd)
[*]Replaced the old Reward Music with a mix of Skyrim & Witcher 3 Style!
[*]New game cart intro music is also replaced!
[*]Sovngarde chant is Pitched!
[*]A total replacement for all Location discovery Music! Inc (Dread - Cities and towns + Generic locations)
[*]Full UI FX Replacement!
[*]Enchanting - Smithing UI & FX Sound effects replaced -BETA-
[*]+15 new much Darker track's! (65% Functional but stil WIP)
[*]A Total Replace for Learn Shout Music FX  and Level Up Music  and Sneak attack music!
[/list]
IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT UPDATING TO Dark Angel's Edition!

[list]
[*]Go to your D:\The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim\Data\music\combat and delete every file that end's with ....[color=#ff0000]Final.xwm[/color]
[/list][color=#ff0000]

[/color]
V0.6.0

[list]
[*]New Improved and solid UI sounds
[*]30+ new tracks from Nemesis
[*]Improvement on the Prealpha
[*]Over +50 Track for normal combat & Dragon combat music!
[*]The Very intense tracks are left for dragon's and other boss combat
[*]Level up music
[*]Reward music
[*]Critical Hit Sound
[*]Shout words music
[*]Main theme replaced with black heart
[*]and much more to enjoy
[*]and im [color=#00ff00]Back[/color] xd
[/list]
Please read the comments first if you need help
[center][youtube]B3fvx5vwURA[/youtube]
[youtube]pEb9GUOXYac[/youtube]

[youtube]GgdKLXkXYYc[/youtube]

DON'T FORGET TO SUPPORT [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3swwxiALG5c0Tvom83tPGg]Two Step's From Hell team On Youtube[/url][/center]Thanks to
[list]
[*]Zoey for her hard work
[*]marcus Vandiloft
[*]two steps from hell for everything in this mod
[/list]
